subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov said having the Nets (6-16) miss the playoffs for the fourth straight season would give them the chance to add top talent in the draft.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov said having the Nets (6-16) miss the playoffs for the fourth straight season would give them the chance to add top talent in the draft.
